description:
Kaito takes down Adachi with Enter the Gold`s power and comes to Nagare`s rescue, who has been taken captive in the depths of the Underbank. Nagare loses his sense of self, evolves into Justice Dollar, and attacks Kaito!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion! The First and Last Big Brawl!!
決着 ￥ 最初で最後の大ゲンカ!!
